
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18796939" title="发布于 2025-03-27 21:53">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一个基于 .NET 开源免费的异地组网和内网穿透工具</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享一个基于 .NET 开源免费的异地组网和内网穿透工具：<span>linker。</span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>工具介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>linker是一个基于 .NET8 开源免费（GPL-2.0 license）的异地组网和内网穿透工具，支持TCP(支持IPV6)打洞、UDP打洞，服务器中继，异地组网使用虚拟网卡将各个客户端组建为局域网络、支持点对点、点对网、网对网等。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215118300-1389832908.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>工具作用</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>使用P2P或者服务器转发，让你的各个局域网连通起来，使这些局域网中的任何联网设备都能进行通信，它适用于需要跨网络进行设备间通信的场景，如远程办公、智能家居控制、文件共享等：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215133581-1380305959.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>已有功能</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215148223-856142767.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>轻松集成</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在.NET8+项目中，<span>nuget 安装&nbsp;<code><span>linker.messenger.entry</span></code><span>:</span></span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>https://www.nuget.org/packages/linker.messenger.entry</span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215202852-122335179.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>集成代码：</span></p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31X4riaibtRCShbTQd4WHVMb1ADUqwRtjNjhmpWEImqTuCl0ljd7X6IczcjEPA24eXTkXaaLev52jy7/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>LinkerMessengerEntry.Initialize();<span><br><span>LinkerMessengerEntry.Build();<span><br><span>LinkerMessengerEntry.Setup(ExcludeModule.None);<span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>工具源代码</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215214650-1190109267.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>工具运行效果</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215227660-789654316.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215232463-1169755598.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215241480-261743338.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215247855-1583427530.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215253178-566916569.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215259203-1955676363.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250327215305380-1897249791.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目源码地址</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多项目实用功能和特性欢迎前往项目开源地址查看👀，别忘了给项目一个Star支持💖。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>开源地址：https://github.com/snltty/linker</span></li>
<li><span>使用文档：https://linker-doc.snltty.com</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该项目已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>GitHub开源地址：https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></li>
<li><span>Gitee开源地址：https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></li>
</ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">&nbsp;</p>
